Name: Caesar™ 3
About the game: Hail Governor, your city awaits. As a provincial governor charged with spreading the glory of Rome our mission is clear: build cities, foster trade and industry, make money. How you accomplish this is entirely up to you. Gain wealth and power, make a career out of pleasing the emperor, battle Barbarians and repel invaders or concentrate on building the next Eternal City. Fail and you’ll end up as lunch for the lions. Prove your strength of mind and spirit and you just may be crowned Caesar! Build rule and defend on one screen - a truly intuitive, helpful interface lets you jump right in and start building. Citizens give you a glimpse into the life of the common man – talk to them for clues about how to improve your city. Various new structures and challenges arise throughout your Governor’s career, for tremendous depth of play and replayability.
